001001 00000 00001 0000000000000001     # addi $r0 $r1 1
000000 00001 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r1
00000000000000000000000000000001        # 1

001000 00000 00001 00010 00000 000000   # add $r0 $r1 $r2
000000 00010 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r2
00000000000000000000000000000001        # 1

001000 00001 00010 00011 00000 000000   # add $r1 $r2 $r3
000000 00011 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r3
00000000000000000000000000000010        # 2

001000 00010 00011 00100 00000 000000   # add $r2 $r3 $r4
000000 00100 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r4
00000000000000000000000000000011        # 3

001000 00011 00100 00101 00000 000000   # add $r3 $r4 $r5
000000 00101 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r5
00000000000000000000000000000101        # 5

001000 00100 00101 00110 00000 000000   # add $r4 $r5 $r6
000000 00110 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r6
00000000000000000000000000001000        # 8

001000 00101 00110 00111 00000 000000   # add $r5 $r6 $r7
000000 00111 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r7
00000000000000000000000000001101        # 13

001001 00000 01000 1111111111101011     # addi $r0 $8 -21
001000 00111 01000 01001 00000 000000   # add $r7 $8 $9
000000 01001 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r9
11111111111111111111111111111000        # -8

001000 01000 01001 01010 00000 000000   # add $r8 $9 $10
000000 01010 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r10
11111111111111111111111111100011        # -29

001000 01001 01010 01011 00000 000000   # add $r9 $10 $11
000000 01011 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r11
11111111111111111111111111011011        # -37

001000 01010 01011 01100 00000 000000   # add $r10 $11 $12
000000 01100 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r12
11111111111111111111111110111110        # -66

001000 01011 01100 01101 00000 000000   # add $r11 $12 $13
000000 01101 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r13
11111111111111111111111110011001        # -103

001000 01100 01101 01110 00000 000000   # add $r12 $13 $14
000000 01110 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r14
11111111111111111111111101010111        # -169

000101 00000 00000 0000000000000000     # halt
